mainText:
Certainly, the world has lost a genius and a wonderful human being.

I'm a web programmer and even when I've worked just few times with
Apple products, I've been always inspired by the technological
advances of this amazing company and by the vision of Steve Jobs.

For me it has been a great honor having lived in the same time that
this great promoter and creator of most of the current computer
technology, and I express my condolences for this lost.
author: Omar
